TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TabControlEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 控件的 和 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the and events of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以确定发生的事件。Use the property to determine which event is occurring. 这使你能够处理与一个事件处理程序的多个事件类型。This enables you to handle multiple event types with one event handler. 使用和属性来确定哪些有关发生该事件。Use the and properties to determine which the event is occurring for. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`TabControl1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `TabControl1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#558](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#558)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#558](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#558)]

span.span: The the event is occurring for.

param.name: tabPageIndex
param.span: 集合中 tabPage 的索引，此索引为从零开始。

span.span: The zero-based index of tabPage in the collection.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新创建的实例的属性值将初始化为指定的参数值。The property values of the newly created instance are initialized to the specified parameter values.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Action As TabControlAction
public: property System::Windows::Forms::TabControlAction Action { System::Windows::Forms::TabControlAction get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示当前发生的事件。

span.span: Gets a value indicating which event is occurring.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`TabControl1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `TabControl1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
